trends: There have been no other sightings in Lovington
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Driving home looked up and seen amber colored orb just floating inthe sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 20,2010 as I was driving home from a friends house I looked up at the sky and seen amber colored orb just floating in the sky. I pulled up my driveway and ran inside my house to grab my video camera ran back outside and began recording for 10 min I got a better look at it when I turned on the nightvision on my video camera it kept fadeing and fadeing until it disappeared.
